items.headline: U.S. says $80 billion worth of nuclear reactors will be built. Cameco’s stock jumps.
items.summary_en: The U.S. government announced a pact to build at least $80 billion worth of nuclear reactors, in a pact to meet the growing power demands caused by artificial intelligence.

items.headline: Amazon to cut 14,000 jobs. Credit — or blame — goes to AI.
items.summary_en: Amazon.com on Tuesday announced job cuts of 14,000, as the megacap tech company said it needs to better prepare for the impact of artificial intelligence.
